com.SIMRacingApps

Interface SIMPlugin.Callback

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MyCallback, PitCountDown, PitSpeedLimit, Post, Shift, ShiftLight, SIMPluginCallback
    Enclosing class:
    SIMPlugin

    public static interface SIMPlugin.Callback
    This interface is used to call back to your implementation as data is received. The methods are called in the same thread that the SIMPlugin.run(Callback) method was invoked in. Each method should return true to continue to process data. Returning false will cause the SIMPlugin.run(Callback) to return.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean DataReady(SIMPlugin SIMPlugin, java.lang.Integer ips)
      Called when data is ready to be used.
      boolean Waiting(SIMPlugin SIMPlugin)
      Called when the connector is not getting data from the SIM.

    • Method Detail

      • DataReady

        boolean DataReady(SIMPlugin SIMPlugin,
                  java.lang.Integer ips)
           throws SIMPlugin.SIMPluginException
        Called when data is ready to be used. Time spent in this call should be less than 16ms to prevent packet loss because this routine is single threaded with the SIMs notification event.
        Parameters:
        SIMPlugin - The SIM Plugin instance.
        ips - The current iterations per second(IPS) value.
        Returns:
        true to continue receiving data, false to stop
        Throws:
        SIMPlugin.SIMPluginException - An problem occurred in the SIMPlugin

      • Waiting

        boolean Waiting(SIMPlugin SIMPlugin)
         throws SIMPlugin.SIMPluginException
        Called when the connector is not getting data from the SIM. But, you are still able to call methods on the connector to get data anyway, it just might be stale data or what the SIM wants you to get when the SIM is not running.
        Parameters:
        SIMPlugin - The SIM Plugin instance
        Returns:
        true to continue receiving data, false to stop
        Throws:
        SIMPlugin.SIMPluginException - If a problem occurred in the SIMPlugin
